title: Installation issue: charmpp
body:
Hi,
I would like to build charmpp with some custom CFLAGS, but seems that spack simply ignore them.
If I run:
```
$ spack install charmpp@6.8.2 cflags="-O3" %intel
```
I can not see any flags in the `spack-build-out.txt`:
```
==> 118682: charmpp: Executing phase: 'install'
==> [2020-04-06-14:43:52.956148, 118706] './build' 'LIBS' 'netlrts-linux-x86_64' 'icc' 'ifort' '-j4' '--destination=/apps/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-sky
lake/intel-19.0.5.281/charmpp-6.8.2-yr4fwwh6vlsd23vwnlwldzcmejn4eldj' 'smp' '--build-shared' '--with-production'
Selected Compiler: icc
Selected Options:  ifort smp
Creating dir: /apps/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake/intel-19.0.5.281/charmpp-6.8.2-yr4fwwh6vlsd23vwnlwldzcmejn4eldj/tmp
Copying src/scripts/Makefile to /apps/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake/intel-19.0.5.281/charmpp-6.8.2-yr4fwwh6vlsd23vwnlwldzcmejn4eldj/tmp
Soft-linking over bin
Soft-linking over lib
Soft-linking over lib_so
Soft-linking over include
Soft-linking over tmp
```

Same behaviour even if I specify the flags in the `compilers.yaml`

### Spack version
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.1-517-268c2a1
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install charmpp@6.8.2 cflags="-O3" %intel
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux ip-AC127404 3.10.0-1062.12.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Feb 4 23:02:59 UTC 2020 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
CentOS Linux release 7.7.1908 (Core)
``` 
and, if relevant, post or attach:
```
$ cat compilers.yaml
compilers:
- compiler:
    spec: gcc@9.2.0
    target: x86_64
    operating_system: centos7
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: [gcc-9.2.0]
    paths:
      cc:  /opt/gcc-9.2.0/bin/gcc
      cxx: /opt/gcc-9.2.0/bin/g++
      f77: /opt/gcc-9.2.0/bin/gfortran
      fc:  /opt/gcc-9.2.0/bin/gfortran
- compiler:
    spec: intel@19.0.5.281
    target: x86_64
    operating_system: centos7
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags:
      cflags: "-ip -xCORE-AVX512 -O3 -g -fp-model fast=2 -no-prec-div -qoverride-limits -DNAMD_DISABLE_SSE -qopenmp-simd -qopt-zmm-usage=high -DCMK_OPTIMIZE -DMPICH_IGNORE_CXX_SEEK"
    modules: []
    paths:
      cc:  /apps/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-19.0.5.281/intel-19.0.5-tsgparku7c5mgjs2hut5viz5ugslc3l6/bin/icc
      cxx: /apps/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-19.0.5.281/intel-19.0.5-tsgparku7c5mgjs2hut5viz5ugslc3l6/bin/icpc
      f77: /apps/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-19.0.5.281/intel-19.0.5-tsgparku7c5mgjs2hut5viz5ugslc3l6/bin/ifort
      fc:  /apps/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-19.0.5.281/intel-19.0.5-tsgparku7c5mgjs2hut5viz5ugslc3l6/bin/ifort
```

Thanks
